notifications.saveError: There was a problem saving your content

leavePrompt.title: Do you really want to leave?
leavePrompt.description: You will lose your unsaved changes

modal.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{denomination}}?
modal.conflictDescription: It looks like the owner or tutor has updated this content recently. Overwriting their changes will discard their input. Are you sure you want to proceed?

noUserContent: There is no user created content yet.
responsibilityAlert: Please note: All content is publicly visible. Help us maintain a safe space by following these guidelines: Don't share personal information, respect copyright and intellectual property, and use appropriate, educational content.
help: Would you like to learn more about creating your own learning content or need help with it? Visit Serlo directly
join: Join the project to create your own content.
